name: Tuscan Organisation of Universities and Research for Europe
goal: TOUR4EU si occupa di favorire l'interazione tra i sette atenei della regione Toscana e le istituzioni europee al fine di supportare la ricerca in differenti ambiti : sanit√†, agricoltura, cambiamenti climatici, efficienza energetica, digitalizzazione.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Sport, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Horizon2020, ricerca ed innovazione, energia, trasporti, Europe on the Move
